attributes.action: Donate all Covid vaccines for healthy UK under 40 year olds to crisis hit India
attributes.additional_details: Our elderly and medically vulnerable citizens now have their protection from Covid 19. The chances of someone under 40 getting seriously unwell from Covid is very small. Having a vaccine does not stop you getting Covid or stop transmission. If you are healthy and under 40, do you really need a vaccination? How about doing a kind act? Instead, do not take up your vaccination invitation. Donate your shot and save a vulnerable life. Make a difference.
attributes.background: In addition, send UK military and medical personnel to India to help administer the vaccinations.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase support for India in the Covid Crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584152

Once priority groups in the UK are vaccinated redirect Covid-19 vaccines abroad: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802
